column4: but also stimulated in other ways

column4: no…

text: .@Foutographe Hi Morocco from @rencontresarles! There's a good feeling to Leica cameras. -JH #LeicaChat
.@seattle_tog I would like to keep my cameras
column4: please. :) -JH #LeicaChat

text: RT @seattle_tog: @leica_camera Can I have your Leica? #LeicaChat
.@kamaxos It wasn't obvious. -JH #LeicaChat
.@kamaxos Like I said before I like constructing series of photos. Therefore it was difficult to reduce it to only 12 images. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @kamaxos: @leica_camera was hard to keep the quality of a major project like Tout Va Bien when reducing it to the Barnak Award ?#LeicaCh…
.@ChancedOut It is a challenge to make it into one book for sure. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @ChancedOut: @leica_camera That would be one BIG book. Thanks JH! #LeicaChat
.@dancinkristy52 Really
column4: that they exist. I pushed the whole vision to the end & they signal that the project is complete. -JH #LeicaChat

text: .@dancinkristy52 That they're done! -JH #LeicaChat
Now is your chance! Only 15 more minutes before our live chat w/ JH Engström concludes. Use #LeicaChat to follow along & ask Qs.
RT @dancinkristy52: @leica_camera You’ve published numerous photo books. What appeals to you about them?  #LeicaChat
.@kamaxos It's more his way of looking and approach to life with of course paired together with his photographic vision. -JH #LeicaChat
.@kamaxos Quite heavy! His weight is more on the general level. He was an important person when I started. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @kamaxos: @leica_camera which is the weight of Anders Petersen in your photographic vision?#LeicaChat
.@ChancedOut Not tomorrow but over the next couple of years I'll turn my 15 books into 1 book. I think I'll start filming too. JH #LeicaChat
.@ChancedOut I always have a lot of projects happening in the background. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @ChancedOut: @leica_camera Do you have any upcoming projects that you can share with us? #LeicaChat
.@shotbyshaun  you have to stay with that despite whatever people say. Don't worry about what people aroudn you think. -JH #LeicaChat
.@shotbyshaun You have to have the courage to be who you are whether you feel pathetic or ridiculous
column4: -JH #LeicaChat

text: RT @shotbyshaun: What advice would you give with regard to the development of ones vision and voice? #LeicaChat
.@jamesjflick How that will look will change
column4: but there will always be people that need to express themselves visually. -JH #LeicaChat

text: .@jamesjflick I believe that people are obsessed with the need to express themselves. That will never change. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @jamesjflick: @leica_camera Where do you see the future of photography heading? #LeicaChat
.@steve_caddy It's both actually. I choose both when I shoot and I always think about the different aesthetics afterwards. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @steve_caddy: With many different formats in play
column4: how do you think about aesthetic when shooting? Deliberately

text: .@ChancedOut There are quite a few; however
column4: I'm more interested in the whole history of photoraphy and its development. -JH #LeicaChat

text: RT @ChancedOut: @leica_camera Which photographers do you admire? #LeicaChat
.@dancinkristy52 It was to express myself because I have that necessity. Hopefully I can communicate that to others. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @dancinkristy52: What was the goal (if any) for your "Tout Va Bien" series? #LeicaChat @leica_camera
.@SimoVaisanen Good luck to the streets! -JH #LeicaChat
RT @SimoVaisanen: @leica_camera #LeicaChat Thanks JH E! Looking forward to the ansver Planning to get LeicaQ for streetphography.
.@themoceanvibe The continued development of the digital tools. - JH #LeicaChat
RT @themoceanvibe: #LeicaChat what
column4: in your opinion
column5: has been the single most groundbreaking Leica accomplishment in the past two years?

text: RT @themoceanvibe: #LeicaChat what
column4: in your opinion
column5: has been the single most groundbreaking Leica accomplishment in the past two years?

text: .@shotbyshaun Time reveals a lot to me if I have the patience. -JH #LeicaChat
.@shotbyshaun I use one of my important tools: time. I try as much as I can to be honest & to be honest I need time. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @shotbyshaun: What’s your process for getting to the heart of a story? #LeicaChat
@hackynajera Hi Mexico! I don't remember them all but there was one with an elk/moose transported from a musuem that I like. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @hackynajera: @leica_camera what's your favorite photo
column4: according with the finalists? Hi from Mexico #LeicaChat

text: .@roelandinho I only use 35mm because I like being close to what I photograph. I don't use other focal lengths. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @roelandinho: @leica_camera What’s your favourite lens and why? How many lenses do you use regularly? #LeicaChat
.@5102yobkcuF It's a good question. I'm not fearless. But I'm not afraid of being afraid. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @5102yobkcuF: @leica_camera Do you feel fearless in terms of photography
column4: or is there still a sense of tremendous risk? #LeicaChat

text: @SimoVaisanen I haven't shot with the #LeicaQ yet. It just came out. The Internet Team will answer you after the chat. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @SimoVaisanen: @leica_camera #LeicaChat How to shoot b&w with the gorgeus LeicaQ? Can you choose b&w EVF?
.@shotbyshaun The rhythm also helps to create story. -JH #LeicaChat
.@shotbyshaun - For me the strongest photography is done in a serial way
column4: I'm not so interested in singular images. -JH #LeicaChat

text: RT @shotbyshaun: @leica_camera Good morning! Please tell us why rhythm in images interests you. #LeicaChat
.@ChancedOut Try to be yourself. Play around a lot. Have fun when you do it. -JH #LeicaChat
RT @ChancedOut: @leica_camera Do you have any advice for a photographer starting out? #LeicaChat
.@jamesjflick It's a simple questions to answer: Great
column4: fantastic! I'm happy. -JH #LeicaChat

text: @kdghantous Thank you!
That should wrap up our #LeicaChat! A special thank you to François Fontaine for participating today! Thanks for all the great questions!
.I'm very interested in how the American dream has changed and transformed. The two faces of America. -FF
.@bianalog Yes my last series just finished. It's about the American dream and counterculture. The fantasy and the reality of it. -FF
RT @bianalog: @leica_camera Where do you see your photography heading in the future? #LeicaChat
.@HelloChrisMoore I could say two. In black and white it's Tabu from 1931. In color
column4: Apocalypse Now. -FF

text: RT @HelloChrisMoore: @leica_camera Do you have a favorite film? If so
column4: what is it? #LeicaChat

text: Now is your chance to ask François Fontaine your questions! Only 15 more minutes before our live chat concludes. Use #LeicaChat to ask Q's!
.@shotbyshaun The most important thing is to go to museums and galleries to see what people do. Artists and not only photographers. -FF
RT @shotbyshaun: Vision and voice: How did you develop yours? What advice would you give to help us develop ours? #LeicaChat
RT @shotbyshaun: How do you get started on a body of work and how do you know when it’s complete? #LeicaChat
.@shotbyshaun  It's never finished and it always continues in my head. Maybe when you bring to book or exhibition it can be finished. -FF
.@shotbysaun Thats a good question. I start when I feel its a priority for me to make a series. Its the good moment and becomes an obsession
.@JudaBorrayo I like the atmosphere of night over day. It is closer to the world of painting and dreams. -FF
RT @JudaBorrayo: What interests you about images with less contrast and a softer feel? #LeicaChat
.@ChancedOut In black and white
column4: Brassaï
column7: Saul Leiter and Miguel Rio Branco -FF

text: RT @ChancedOut: @leica_camera Which photographers do you admire? #LeicaChat
.@andrewmennesker Silzenio! is part of the 100 years of Leica exhibition. But also will be exhibited entirely in Wetzlar soon! -FF
RT @AndreMennesker: #LeicaChat  Hello François
column4: are there any plans for an exhibition in Germany?

text: .@jamesjflick My goal was to make my subjects dreamy and let them travel through the world of cinema. -FF
RT @jamesjflick: What was your goal for your SILENZIO! series? #LeicaChat
.@ChristianeK  It was the last compact film camera made by Leica before digital came out. It's more a collector piece now! -FF
.@Chefmattrock  Even in my travel or conceptual pictures
column4: i rely on heavily on my intuition. I'm instinctive on set. Emotional and free. -FF

text: RT @Chefmattrock: .@leica_camera what's your mix of spontaneity vs planning on a photoshoot?#Leicachat
.@dancinkristy52 Lobster tacos! Just kidding! But I love the atmosphere especially at night
column4: and the kindness of the people here.  -FF

text: RT @dancinkristy52: What are you enjoying most at @ParisPhoto this weekend? #LeicaChat #ParisPhotoLA
.@shotbyshaun Emotion definitely. Also color is very important to me because it's similar to a painting. -FF
RT @shotbyshaun: What are the key ingredients that you put into your photographs and why are they important to you? #LeicaChat
.@bianalog Movies are 24 times more emotional than a single image but only one photo could symbolize a entire film. -FF
RT @bianalog: @leica_camera François
column4: “Silenzio!” is an homage to cinema. What appeals to you about movies? #LeicaChat

text: RT @bianalog: @leica_camera François
column4: “Silenzio!” is an homage to cinema. What appeals to you about movies? #LeicaChat

text: .@chancedout I think believe in what you are
column4: what you like
column6: what you feel and importantly keep your eyes open. -FF
